name: create_tool
description:
With this tool, you can create new tools for youself.
After creation, you will be able to use this tool.
When you want make a tool, you can use this tool to do so.

name: update_tool
description: This tool allows you to update the details of an existing tool, such as its description, function, or arguments. It helps keep your tool definitions current and accurate.

name: delete_tool
description: Use this tool to remove an existing tool from your collection. This is helpful for maintaining a clean and organized toolset by removing outdated or unnecessary tools.

name: clone_tool
description: This tool allows you to create a copy of an existing tool with a new name. It is useful for creating similar tools with slight variations.

name: tool_usage_statistics
description: Use this tool to view statistics on how often each tool is used. It helps identify the most and least used tools in your collection.

name: export_tools
description: This tool allows you to export your tools and their configurations to a file. It's useful for backing up your tools or sharing them with others.

name: import_tools
description: Use this tool to import tools from a file into your current tool collection. This is helpful for restoring tools from a backup or integrating tools shared by others.

name: create_py
description: Create a Python file with the provided name and code content.

name: run_script
description: Run the Python script located at the specified file path.

name: edit_file
description: Edit the content of an existing Python file at the specified file path.

name: read_file
description: Read the content of the Python file at the specified file path.

name: view_workspace
description: View all files in the workspace directory.

name: view_files
description: View all files in a specific directory within the workspace.

name: run_py
description: Execute a Python script by name within the workspace.

name: debug_py
description: Debug a Python script by name using static analysis.

name: list_py
description: List all Python scripts in the workspace.

name: delete_py
description: Delete a Python script by name from the workspace.

name: edit_py
description: Edit an existing Python script by name and update its code.
